pageTitle: Petra Tour from Jerusalem or from Tel Aviv - by Bus - via Eilat
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {29019=DAY 1     Independent arrival to JLM or TLV Central Bus Station & travel to Eilat by Egged public bus - we pre-book your seats on the bus. Bus time options from JLM are : 07:00 am or 10:00 am or 14:00 pm or 17:00 pm. (JLM - Eilat about 4.5 hrs ride). Bus time options from TLV : First bus 06:00 am, then every hour & half till 20:00 pm. (TLV - EIlat about 5 hours ride) . Independent check in at Eilat hotel. Overnight in Eilat link> Map of Eilat, 52004=Working Hours & Days Sunday - Thursday 08:00 am - 22:00 pm Tel +972 8 631 6860 Fax +972 8 860 4372 USA 1 800 490 5251 @ Contact us, 25450=Bring Along Passport, $60 in cash for border taxes, sunscreen lotion, hat, comfortable walking shoes, warm clothes (Nov. to Mar. very cold in Petra. Jan - Feb. may snow!) Don't forget your swim suit for the Red Sea... to enjoy while in Eilat!}
